title: People of Walmart: State of Emergency: A Parody
description: Take Cover ―People of Walmart has issued an official state of emergency! Fortunately for you, all the survival gear you need is conveniently located at your favorite local supercenter, where these crazy, cringe-worthy shoppers are letting their freak flags fly high than ever. In this brand new collection from the wildly popular website, PeopleofWalmart.com, discover how the colorful characters in your home state match up against oddballs across the country. Featuring hilarious new fan photos, bizarre state trivia, fun facts, and more―from the proudly pants-less in Alabama to the triumphant return of the mullet in Massachusetts―find out who will take the prize in the ultimate fight for Walmart supremacy!
author: Andrew Kipple
